MCQ: What is the scientific study of life called?
Choices: a: Physics | b: Biology | c: Chemistry | d: Geology

MCQ: Which of the following is NOT a unifying theme in biology?
Choices: a: Evolution | b: Energy processing | c: Quantum mechanics | d: Heredity

MCQ: What is the smallest unit of life?
Choices: a: Atom | b: Cell | c: Tissue | d: Organ

MCQ: Which of the following is an example of a eukaryotic organism?
Choices: a: Bacteria | b: Protists | c: Archaea | d: Fungi

MCQ: Approximately how long ago did life emerge on Earth?
Choices: a: 1 billion years ago | b: 2.7 billion years ago | c: 3.7 billion years ago | d: 4.7 billion years ago
